messages.message: Is there any documentation on the `system/global/fs/Instabase%20Drive/` concept used for Marketplace?
cc @cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify, I think you used it recently in a PR?

I am trying to see if this is a place where i can put some system-wide Model Service models - not sure how this folder is loaded, if it is cleared frequently, how a new customer gets it loaded up, etc…

messages.sender: cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify
messages.message: good q - i just copied the path from some other JS code… @Kerry or @Eric Han or @Paul H might have insight?
It’s just a hidden drive that we unpack “installed” marketplace solutions/apps to. From what I know it’s updated by either publishing an app or uploading a bundle of apps to a customer installation.
What is meant by hidden? I can navigate directly to it

@Aaron Vontell  - It’s not exposed explicitly by the File picker. If you know the URL you can navigate. It’s more for internal use. You may need to setup folder permissions explicitly. We can chat about how you’re planning to use it! (Also, you’re able to see the contents because you’re an admin!)
+1 for this ^, and since system repo is a remote file system, @Aaron Vontell i ll encourage you to expect slowness in read/write and maybe prepare read-after-write inconsistencies (using retries).
